trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event occurs when a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> is added or removed from a managed collection of such lists.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>zdarzenie po <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>dodaniu lub usunięciu z zarządzanej kolekcji takich list.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when an individual list element changes its value.
trans-unit.target: To zdarzenie nie jest wywoływane, gdy element listy poszczególnych zmienia jego wartość.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event is generated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>Zdarzeń jest generowany przez <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>klasę gdy jego <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, i <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A>metody są wykonywane.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.

For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter will always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Dla <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>zdarzenia `relatedObject` parametru zawsze będzie odwoływać się do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>który <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>jest skojarzony.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt, który jest skojarzony z tą kolekcją.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> has been added or removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Wartość, która określa, czy <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> został dodany lub usunięty z kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: The collection of list elements after the action has been applied.
trans-unit.target: Kolekcja elementów listy, po zastosowaniu akcji.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera kolekcję <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> obiekty skojarzone z tym zdarzeniem.

trans-unit.source: The retrieved <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> represents the state of the collection after the event, which involved adding or removing an element, has been applied.
trans-unit.target: Pobranej <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>reprezentuje stan kolekcji po zastosowaniu zdarzenia związane z dodawania lub usuwania elementu,.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> that represents the current state of the collection.
Gets a flag indicating whether an element has been added or removed from the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera flagę wskazującą, czy element został dodany lub usunięty z kolekcji <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> obiektów.

trans-unit.source: Altering the contents of an existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> in the collection will not raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Zmienianie zawartość istniejącej <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>w kolekcji nie będą powodowały <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>zdarzeń.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType"></xref> that indicates the type of change.
Gets the object that that is associated with the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera obiekt, który skojarzony z kolekcji <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> obiektów.

trans-unit.source: The RelatedObject property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Właściwość RelatedObject umożliwia programisty do skojarzenia obiektu do wystąpienia <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>klasy.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the RelatedObject property should always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Dla <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>zdarzeń, właściwość RelatedObject zawsze powinna odwoływać <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName>który <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>jest skojarzony.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>
